title: Meta Ray-Bans are getting live translation
content:
During Wednesday’s Meta Connect event, CEO Mark Zuckerberg announce a slew of new AI-fueled features for the company’s Ray-Ban collaboration. The most interesting of the bunch is the addition of real-time translation through the glasses’ speakers. Meta explains, Soon, your glasses will be able to translate speech in real time. When you’re talking to someone […]

title: Mark Zuckerberg says Meta AI has nearly 500 million users
content:
Mark Zuckerberg said today that Meta AI is one of the most used AI assistant across the world with “almost” 500 million monthly active users. Speaking at the company’s Meta Connect event, Zuckerberg said that Meta AI is on track to become the most used assistant across the world. “We’re almost at 500 million monthly […]

title: Meta Connect 2024: Quest 3S headset, Meta AI upgrades, Ray-Ban Meta real-time video and more revealed
content:
Meta Connect 2024 is starting soon, and with it comes the expectation of reveals and updates to Meta’s latest AI model and metaverse ambitions. title: Meta has rebuilt Instagram and Facebook for its Quest headsets
content:
At its annual Meta Connect event on Wednesday, Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg announced that the company has rebuilt its social apps for mixed reality. “We’ve got all new Instagram and Facebook experiences to bring your feeds and your Reels with you into mixed reality,” Zuckerberg said. “A really nice interface so you can lean back […]

title: Canva adds new abilities for app developers and improves discoverability
content:
Canva just announced new enhancements to its developer platform, such as including premium apps with its Pro subscription, a translation feature for apps, better discovery mechanisms, and new API functionalities. The creative tool company started its developer program in June 2023 to let developers build add-ons that people can use in Canva. Think of them […]

content:
Meta announced that Meta AI will now be able to help you edit photos using AI technology as well as answer questions about the photos you share.

content:
With the update, users will be able to use prompts to generate AI photos directly in their feed, Stories, and for their Facebook profile pictures.

title: Diagrid launches Catalyst to help enterprises build their microservices
content:
Back in 2019, Microsoft launched Dapr, a new open-source project that made building event-driven distributed applications easier for developers. Like so many popular open-source projects, Dapr spawned its own ecosystem, especially after Microsoft donated it to the Linux Foundation. And as is also so often the case, some of the creators of Dapr — and […]

title: Amazon employees beg management to reverse 5-day RTO mandate
content:
Amazon CEO Andy Jassy announced to employees last week that they will be expected to work from the office five days a week, starting in 2025. Employees who have grown accustomed to a hybrid work structure are “strongly dissatisfied,” according to an anonymous survey created by Amazon employees. As Fortune reports, hundreds of employees responded […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

title: Longshot Space closes over $5M in new funding to build space gun in the desert
content:
Why use a rocket when you could use a giant, miles-long “gun” instead?  That’s the question posed by Longshot Space, a company that’s completely rethinking how to send mass to orbit. The company is developing a kinetic launch system that will gradually accelerate payloads to hypersonic speeds before launching them to orbit. While Longshot’s full-scale […]

title: After losing a peering lawsuit in Germany, Meta says it’s never getting back together with Deutsche Telekom
content:

title: Ayrton Energy mimics margarine to store hydrogen safely
content:
As the universe’s lightest gas, hydrogen is tricky to contain. But there’s an alternative: attaching hydrogen atoms to a carrier molecule that’s easier to move.
